title: Katie Holmes nails city sophistication as she bundles up in beige trench coat
text:
She's the ultimate city girl.

Kate Holmes embraced New York fashion while enjoying a crisp fall stroll through the Big Apple on Tuesday.

The Dawson's Creek actress, 40, was wrapped up warm in a beige trench coat, jeans, and leopard print flats.

City girl! Kate Holmes embraced New York fashion while enjoying a crisp fall stroll through the Big Apple on Tuesday

Though she looked a little cold, she at least was looking stylish.

A long-time New Yorker, Katie was definitely dressed with the elements in mind as she strolled through the concrete jungle sporting an array of layers.

The naturally stunning actress went easy on the makeup, appearing to go for a fresh face look rather than a full palette of makeup.

She dressed the look up with a delicate pair of studded earrings and a black purse slung across her wrist.

Take a walk on the wild side: Holmes sported a chic pair of leopard print flats

By the looks of the smile on her face, Katie definitely looked like she was in a good mood.

Katie is occasionally seen hanging out with her teenage daughter Suri Cruise, but that did not appear to be the case today.

The actress shares Suri, 13, with her ex-husband Tom Cruise, who she was married to from 2006 to 2012.

Styling: She dressed the look up with a delicate pair of studded earrings and a black purse slung across her wrist

Katie has found herself single again after recently ending a long-term relationship with Jamie Foxx.

The couple went public with their romance in late 2017, though it had been speculated they had been together for years earlier.

Recently, it had been reported Katie was dipping her toes back into the dating pond.

'Her No. 1 priority is meeting someone who can build a strong relationship with Suri. If they don't tick that box, Katie's just not interested,' a source told In Touch Weekly.
